author: Staff Reporter
text:
Bharat Sanchar Nigam Limited (BSNL), Vellore in coordination with Taluk Legal Services Committee is conducting a Lok Adalat to realise the telephone outstanding dues from defaulters of Tirupattur and connected areas on January 9.

According to a press release, the committee will review the defaulter cases of landline and WLL to settle the outstanding dues mutually to avoid further legal action.

Defaulters, who have been summoned, and others with any dispute can avail of this final opportunity and settle their cases.

Defaulters have been requested to come prepared for spot payment/settlement. The Lok Adalat will be conducted at the Taluk Legal Services Committee, court compound, Tirupattur from 10 a.m., the release said.
title: Lok Adalat to be held on January 9
